name: Antiflux
description: Antiflux is a challenging but fun puzzle platformer with upgrades, building complexity over time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.6Ghz AMD64 dual-core processor Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 integrated DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4Ghz  AMD64 quad-core processor Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 integrated DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Nice mind-breaker, If you want to have a good time. 10/10 for portals
